mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KEYWORD_ANALYSIS (ANS_SQ, TALENT_SQ, KEYWORD_SQ, KEYWORD_COUNT) VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{ansSq}), TO_NUMBER(#{talentSq}), TO_NUMBER(#{keywordSq}), #{keywordCount})
mapper.select: SELECT e.talent_nm, SUM(percent) AS percent FROM (SELECT c.talent_nm, b.keyword_content, a.keyword_count, ROUND(LENGTH(b.keyword_content)/LENGTH(d.ans_content)*100 ,2) AS percent FROM keyword_analysis a, keyword b, talent c, answer d WHERE a.keyword_sq = b.keyword_sq AND a.talent_sq = c.talent_sq AND a.ans_sq = d.ans_sq AND a.ans_sq = #{ansSq} AND a.keyword_count > 0) e GROUP BY e.talent_nm ORDER BY percent DESC

SELECT c.talent_nm, b.keyword_content FROM keyword_analysis a, keyword b, talent c WHERE a.keyword_sq = b.keyword_sq AND c.talent_sq = a.talent_sq AND c.talent_nm = #{talentNm} AND a.ans_sq = #{ansSq} AND a.keyword_count > 0
